languages.text: "Как мог{mf||ла} Вольный Торговец допустить тебя в свиту? Что за изъян воли позволил {mf|ему|ей} найти тебе, мерзость, место подле себя?"
"How could the Rogue Trader allow you into {mf|his|her} retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"
languages.original_text: "Как мог{mf||ла} Вольный Торговец допустить тебя в свиту? Что за изъян воли позволил {mf|ему|ей} найти тебе, мерзость, место подле себя?"

traits.locale_text: "How could the Rogue Trader allow you into his retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"
"How could the Rogue Trader allow you into his retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"
"How could the Rogue Trader allow you into his retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"
"How could the Rogue Trader allow you into his retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"

languages.text: “行商浪人怎么会允许你成为{mf|他|她}的随行人员呢？{mf|他|她}的意志究竟有多么孱弱，才会允许你这样的邪恶之物留在{mf|他|她}的身边？”
languages.original_text: "How could the Rogue Trader allow you into {mf|his|her} retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人怎么会允许你成为{mf|他|她}的随行人员呢？{mf|他|她}的意志究竟有多么孱弱，才会允许你这样的邪恶之物留在{mf|他|她}的身边？”
“行商浪人怎么会允许你成为{mf|他|她}的随行人员呢？{mf|他|她}的意志究竟有多么孱弱，才会允许你这样的邪恶之物留在{mf|他|她}的身边？”

languages.text: « Comment {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a-t-{mf|il|elle} pu vous permettre de rejoindre son entourage ? Qu'est-ce qui a bien pu {mf|le|la} pousser à accepter quelqu'un comme vous à ses côtés ? »
languages.original_text: "How could the Rogue Trader allow you into {mf|his|her} retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a-t-{mf|il|elle} pu vous permettre de rejoindre son entourage ? Qu'est-ce qui a bien pu {mf|le|la} pousser à accepter quelqu'un comme vous à ses côtés ? »

languages.text: «¿Cómo ha podido permitir {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente que te unas a su séquito? ¿Qué flaqueza de voluntad l{mf|e|a} llevó a encontrar un lugar a su lado para una abominación como tú?».
languages.original_text: "How could the Rogue Trader allow you into {mf|his|her} retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo ha podido permitir {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente que te unas a su séquito? ¿Qué flaqueza de voluntad l{mf|e|a} llevó a encontrar un lugar a su lado para una abominación como tú?».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者は、どうしてあなたを自分の従者にできたの？あなたのような忌まわしい者のそばに{mf|彼|彼女}が自分の居場所を見出すように仕向けるなんて、どんな恐ろしい意志があったのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Как мог{mf||ла} Вольный Торговец допустить тебя в свиту? Что за изъян воли позволил {mf|ему|ей} найти тебе, мерзость, место подле себя?"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者は、どうしてあなたを自分の従者にできたの？あなたのような忌まわしい者のそばに｛彼|彼女}が自分の居場所を見出すように仕向けるなんて、どんな恐ろしい意志があったのかしら？」
「自由開拓者は、どうしてあなたを自分の従者にできたの？あなたのような忌まわしい者のそばに｛彼|彼女}が自分の居場所を見出すように仕向けるなんて、どんな恐ろしい意志があったのかしら？」

languages.text: "Wie kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Euch in {mf|sein|ihr} Gefolge aufnehmen? Welches Versagen des Willens hat {mf|ihn|sie} dazu gebracht, für eine Abscheulichkeit wie Euch einen Platz an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seite zu finden?"
languages.original_text: "How could the Rogue Trader allow you into {mf|his|her} retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Euch in sein Gefolge aufnehmen? Welches Versagen des Willens hat {mf|ihn|sie} dazu gebracht, für eine Abscheulichkeit wie Euch einen Platz an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seite zu finden?"

"Wie kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Euch in sein Gefolge aufnehmen? Welches Versagen des Willens hat {mf|ihn|sie} dazu gebracht, für eine Abscheulichkeit wie Euch einen Platz an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seite zu finden?"

languages.original_text: "How could the Rogue Trader allow you into his retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"

languages.text: "Nasıl oldu da Hür Tacir seni maiyetine aldı? Bu nasıl bir akıl tutulması ki senin gibi bir garabet, onun yanında yer bulabiliyor?"
languages.original_text: "How could the Rogue Trader allow you into {mf|his|her} retinue? What failure of will led {mf|him|her} to find a place at {mf|his|her} side for an abomination like you?"

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl oldu da Hür Tacir seni maiyetine aldı? Bu nasıl bir akıl tutulması ki senin gibi bir garabet, onun yanında yer bulabiliyor?"
